I believe it would be a great addition to your collection and enhance your experience significantly. Considering its worth and the value it brings, I propose to sell it to you for $95. This price reflects its quality and the benefits it offers. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer
